messages.content: What is the main function of the Randomize LoRAs node?
The Randomize LoRAs node randomly loads LoRAs based on a predefined selection with also randomized weights. This enables users to experiment with different artistic effects on their generated images.
How can I ensure reproducibility when using this node?
Maintain the same seed for the Randomize LoRAs node to ensure reproducibility. Additionally, keep the same selected LoRAs for consistent results across generations.
How can I limit the number of LoRAs applied in a generation?
You can limit the maximum number of LoRAs to apply by setting the max_random field in the configuration fields. This allows you to choose fewer LoRAs, even if you initially selected up to 10.
How do I install the Randomize LoRAs node in ComfyUI?

First, navigate to your `ComfyUI/custom_nodes` directory in your terminal. Then, clone the repository using the command `git clone https://github.com/unwdef/unwdef-nodes-comfyui.git`. Finally, restart ComfyUI to apply the changes.
How can I uninstall the custom node?
To remove the custom node, delete the `unwdef-nodes-comfyui` directory from `ComfyUI/custom_nodes`, and then restart ComfyUI to apply the changes.
How can I update the Randomize LoRAs node?
To update the node, navigate to `ComfyUI/custom_nodes/unwdef-nodes-comfyui` in your terminal and run the command `git pull`. Finally, restart ComfyUI to apply the changes.
